actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit a taxpayer to deduct, or to claim a credit for, amounts paid as tuition for his own education or the education of another individual.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals alternative, limited income tax credits or deductions for the tuition paid for the primary, secondary or higher education of any individual.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit a taxpayer to deduct, or to claim a credit for, amounts paid as tuition for his own education or the education of another individual.
